goals.active: Find the ship that Exemplar Kerida has waiting for you.
Explore the Orrian coast to see if the Eye of Janthir is here.
goals.complete: It's wonderful to see so many working so hard to reclaim Orr. A large group of sylvari are making strides by returning the Risen to the soil. I encountered the ghost of King Reza and Firstborn Dagonet as well. They're both attempting to revitalize this land. I've learned that ley-line energy can be used to reclaim dead Risen.
